about_the_game:
Taryn Barker: Demon Hunter is an action-adventure game where you step into the shoes of Taryn, a skilled warrior with a dark past. You’ll fight your way through hordes of demonic creatures, solve puzzles, and explore dark, atmospheric environments reminiscent of classic survival horror and sword fighting games. Armed with a katana, twin blades, and a crossbow, you’ll face increasingly tough enemies as you uncover the mysteries behind the demonic invasion.

Combat isn’t just about slashing through enemies—it’s about mastering timing, learning attack patterns, and using your weapons strategically. But it’s not all about fighting—there are puzzles along the way that will challenge your mind and force you to think critically, much like the classic survival horror puzzles.

With a mix of fast-paced combat and thoughtful exploration, Taryn Barker: Demon Hunter delivers a unique blend of action and mystery that fans of classic survival horror will appreciate.

You’ll fight your way through hordes of demonic creatures, solve puzzles, and explore dark, atmospheric environments reminiscent of classic survival horror and sword fighting games. Armed with a katana, twin blades, and a crossbow, you’ll face increasingly tough enemies as you uncover the mysteries behind the demonic invasion.

Combat isn’t just about slashing through enemies—it’s about mastering timing, learning attack patterns, and using your weapons strategically. But it’s not all about fighting—there are puzzles along the way that will challenge your mind and force you to think critically, much like the classic survival horror puzzles.

With a mix of fast-paced combat and thoughtful exploration, Taryn Barker: Demon Hunter delivers a unique blend of action and mystery that fans of classic survival horror will appreciate.
name: Taryn Barker: Demon Hunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

short_description: Taryn Barker is on a quest for vengeance against the demonic forces that haunt the night. Wield deadly weapons, solve puzzles, and battle dark enemies in this action-packed 2D adventure inspired by survival horror classics. Can you survive and uncover the truth?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
